alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 8:41PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Hampshire, northwestern Franklin and northwestern Hampden Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 840 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Charlemont, or 13 miles east of North Adams, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Northampton, Easthampton, Southampton, Williamsburg, Huntington, Buckland, Conway, Shelburne, Ashfield, Colrain, Westhampton, Whately, Chester, Charlemont, Chesterfield, Worthington, Goshen, Cummington, Heath and Plainfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
